issue.message: The current server URL '/v1.33' needs to be updated to a templated URL 'https://{your-n8n-instance-domain}/api/v{api-version-number}' and include variable definitions for dynamic host and API version.

repairs.action_taken: Updated the URL of the first server entry from '/v1.33' to 'https://{your-n8n-instance-domain}/api/v{api-version-number}' and added definitions for 'your-n8n-instance-domain' and 'api-version-number' variables, with '1.33' as the default for the API version.
